comment._content: This one gave me goosebumps. The depth of field and lighting really gives the image a three-dimensional quality. You can just imagine the noise of all those children!!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
8468254@N02
comment._content: I don't really have an aesthetic favourite; There's too many good ones and not enough outstanding railway or castle ones. I just rate them by how much fun they are to research, so I don't think my favourite would have any relevance or appeal for anyone else except possibly NIreland Eye.
